item.title: Advanced Arithmetic in Bitcoin Script
item.description: In Bitcoin, we are limited to basic arithmetic. Everything available to us in Script is addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and modulus. If we want to challenge Ethereum and build Defi applications using automated market makers, compound interest or liquidity mechanisms, this is not enough. Fortunately, there is a way to use what we have available and implement everything we need. We built a library for Vala implementing log, exp, root and pow.
